title: Don't mess with us hot gamer girls!
body:
So I told the enemy team that I was a gamer girl and that I'm actually pretty good, to prove a point that gamer girls don't suck. Because a lot of gamer girls I see usually just feed, and it really makes my gender group look bad. Like you guys look down to us and only think of us as objects. So I really wanted to prove a point. What do I get from the enemy team? Negativity. Wow. They were being sarcastic and then suddenly calling me a biiiitch who needs a good bang. Then they started focusing me the early game and harassed me to the point where I was 0/6 KDA

So I did my best to not give into this rudeness and negative behaviour. Enough was enough. Katarina can easily catch up, I was using her this game. I was waiting for the right moment to jump into the fight to do a kill steal, because I needed a few kills to get back into the game properly. So I got my first kill on one of the guys who trash talked me the whole game. Then that's when I started owning them and made them my biitch. In the end, I was 12/9 and had the most kills in my team. 

So as we got into the end game lobby, I just laughed at them. Pretty much spammed "AHAHAHAHAHAHA, GO GAMER GIRLS!" and they had nothing good to say back. They felt embarrassed. One of them tried to make a comeback by being sarcastic, but why would I be mad. He was pissed since he was telling me how much I sucked at the game. It made me feel good that I got to carry my team and proved them wrong that I didn't suck.

So quit disrespecting us gamer girls. A lot of us a good at League of Legends. Deal with it!

replies.body:
Yeah the rude behaviour is not so nice towards gamer girls. I guess they've never had a girlfriend before. Btw, interesting name, kinda rude in itself {{item:3001}} 

I'm such a nerd that I'll probably marry a gamer girl haha.
Let's be honest though.. what kind of girl names herself Lady Bumhole even in jest?

> [{quoted}](name=Sunlit Earth,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RvKpLuOu,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-08T13:54:15.749+0000)
>
> Let's be honest though.. what kind of girl names herself Lady Bumhole even in jest?

So you're saying that all women are completely proper?
Nope, I'm a good example myself of one who isn't. I just personally don't understand the humour in the name, seems more like an idea that would come from an adolescent boy.

Okay, but why did you feel the need to tell them you're a girl? I don't do that in my games. It's best to just let them think you're a guy, otherwise you're asking for even more abuse, or you're probably just trying to show off and make them compliment/like you. It doesn't work like that. The internet is full of young teenage boys who think it's okay to abuse women online. 

And for the record, I do not 'feed every game'. Nor do many of the other females I play this game with.

the fact that identify yourself as a 'gamer girl' is inadvertently sexist in its own rights and your doing your gender no good by profiling yourself, i dare say people don't 'pick on' you because you are a female, the fact that you portray yourself as girl gamer which is blatantly anti-feminist deserves ridicule. 100% of people who depict themselves as girl gamers are attention seeking and nothing more

I like all the serious comments on this. 

Well done lady bumhole, oce board-ists have a long way to go!
didnt even read your wall of text, nobody cares that you're a "gamer girl" you're a freaking gamer, if you want equality, don't bring sex in to it, bye.
u kno le rulez m9 u show pic 2 prov ur gril or u get ignor3d
All girls play kat. dont be proud. she isnt hard. and to think you had to ks with her....
I actually haven't played kat once in all my time on League.
I have only ever played Kat in a bot game, then decided she wasn't my play style.

There is no need to profess it to everyone and anyone. I don't go to everyone in game saying I'm a good gamer guy do I now? Honestly you're just better off keeping it to yourself. Screaming it to everyone is, in a way, just "asking" for that kind of response.
I think your standard of "a hot girl" is much lower to those who have reasonable eye sight.
